content: a crochet market bag for everyday this little circle fits into your pocket or handbag when your at the shop turn her inside out & ta darrr you have a reusable market bag to take the place of that unnecessary plastic bag i have made this pattern in 3 sizes small for a piece of fruit medium average plastic bag size & large for your bigger items ideal for an advanced beginner through to advanced crocheter this is a large pdf file with very detailed notes & photos the pattern is written in us terms and includes conversion table in uk terms step by step tutorial with written instructions & additional photos made to craft yarn council standards skill level beginner materials used 100 - 250meters of dk cotton yarn 3mm crochet hook sissors yarn needle 2 beads if you have any queries or questions feel free to contact me at any time i am always here & happy to help to get the latest news & updates on moara crochet please follow me on instagram at www instagram com/moara_crochet or like my page at https //www facebook com/moaracrochet this pattern is copyright moaracrochet © each pattern has taken many hours to provide clear instructions & been tested by purchasing you agree not to distribute the pattern in any way for free or sale if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my etsy shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
